result.title: DREEM APP - final release
result.description: Output of Task 2.4:Learning of the pilots in Turin, Goteborg and Belgium will be reflected in this final APP release. Moreover, the integration of B2C needs based will also occur and be tested in this phase (e.g. e-ticketing, multi-user usage, best route calculation based on traffic). Real-time monitoring and notifications will be included in this final release.Success/failure indicators:on time release of the final APP version bug-free. APP shall satisfy all the user needs collected during pilots

result.title: Manuscript with literature review
result.description: This review will map literature on teaching research integrity for three different groups The literature will be reviewed in the period of 19902018 and will be categorized according to relevant criteria including target groups disciplines aim and focus of the teaching tools working method evaluations and assessment of effects The review will be presented as a manuscript for an international peer reviewed journal

result.title: Post processing and surface finishing qualification protocol
result.description: The task addresses the work to prepare process performance qualification protocols for post processing and surface finishing The protocol is vital in maintaining the production quality by recording and reviewing essential conditions testing and expected manufacturing outcome of the manufacturing process The protocol will includeManufacturing conditions as operating parameters equipment limits component inputsData to be collected and analysedTests to be performed and acceptance criteria for each processing stepA sampling planStatus of validation of analytical methodsReview and approvalThe solution will be electronically and connected to a server where the quality protocol can be reached anywhere and at any time by authorized persons using a unique part ID information

result.title: Establish technology driven standard qualification protocol
result.description: Based on T91 to T95 by taking in consideration the relation between the measured parameters ex powder flowability particle size beam scan rates etc and quality of fabricated parts two mains qualification standards will be prepared a the qualification standard b process protocol In the first one the criteria for qualification will be established and in the second one the detailed process for fabrication of qualified components will be prepared The protocols will contain the full chain process qualification control methods and fabrication

result.title: Phase 2: Evaluation Report
result.description: Report on a task consisting of 2 phases first a framework and method dimensions indicators and data collection methods for vendors evaluation under the technical and commercial perspectives will be identified second consensus about the framework main measures and indicators will be met within the consortium Tender evaluation framework will include the following criteria among others Vendor characteristicsexperience customers products portfolio ability to deliver support and maintenance capabilities ISO andor CMMI international coverage etcTechnical review including system design performance throughput system usability growth expansion security compliancy with all the regulatory requirementsCommercial reviewA framework for the evaluation of User Needs Identification and Concept Viability will be identified The framework will based on Literature review Expert opinion Workshops with professionals carried out in the three procuring authorities Endusers interviews
